website_summaries.verdict: You'd have a hard time finding more reliable herb seeds with better variety than these from Open Seed Vault, a top company in producing high-quality seeds.
pros: A large collection that includes 12 popular medicinal and culinary non-GMO heirloom herb seeds with 12 peat pellets to get you started
cons: A few consumers complain about inadequate germination, but many more are happy with the results

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely AMAZING results!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never grew herbs or anything in my life, and these all germinated perfectly. The plants I grew over the summer have lasted me through this winter even after bringing them inside. I had a harvest like this picture every 1-2 weeks, which was life changing. Froze the extras and use them all the time! I am never going back to dry herbs again. GET THIS KIT! easy enough for anyone who has a windowsill!!! Strong herbs you can smell from across the yard. Also since they are heirloom they easily produce seeds so I collected many for the years to come and to give away! I have probably 3000 cilantro seeds and 1000 basil seeds from these plants. Nuff said!!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Great seeds, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Started an herb garden in the house. The seeds were near 100 percent germination except for the cilantro. I wrote the sellers after a week of a really poor cilantro germination and within a couple days my new seeds were at my door. The new seeds were awesome btw. I did not have any mixed or mis labeled seeds. They have matured and grown extremely well indoors. Will Buy again if I need more and I would recommend these to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Easy to Grow, Even for Black Thumbs
customer_reviews.text: I have a BLACK thumb when it comes to growing things. I have never been good at it, but these seeds work like magic! Within days of planting, they were already popping up. I don't think there is anyone on this planet that cannot grow these seeds.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: High germination, healthy plants!
customer_reviews.text: 98% of my seeds planted have germinated. the plants are very healthy plants and transplant well. I have and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: B. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Great, will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Germination rates were some of the best I’ve seen. I’m used to planting heirloom seeds and watching dirt - these seeds sprouted up healthy and strong. I planted the peet starters it came with in a big, self watering pot and even my cilantro thrived! The arugula is excellent too, extremely slow bolt which is imperative if you’ve ever dealt with a bolting arugula!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Schnibbe

customer_reviews.title: Needs to list varieties
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to plant these so my review may change depending on germination rates, but I wanted to list what type of each herb is in the packet as I was unsure when I purchased it what varieties of each herb I was getting. Thought this might be useful. -Anise, Pimpinella Anisum -Flat Leaf Parsley -Summer Savory -Common Chives -Italian Oregano -Broad Leaved Sage -Cumin, Cuminum Cyminum -Common Thyme -Italian Large Leaf Basil -Bouquet Dill -Sweet Marjoram -Slow Bolt Cilantro
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great package with the individual seed packs sealed inside
customer_reviews.text: Great package with the individual seed packs sealed inside. I'm working on getting the hydroponics herb garden built to start planting these in and will update with pictures later. A definite must have for those looking to grow their own culinary and medical herb garden.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because I had so much success with the survival garden from the same company, and this one is equally impressive!! Everything sprouted quickly and looks so healthy. Germination rate is around 98% even for the “difficult to grow” herbs. So perfect! I started my seedlings under an LED grow light 16 hrs on and 6 off, and they are doing so wonderful. I only wish that open seed vault had more kits!! They are an authority when it comes to providing quality seeds with super high germination rates. Great for the beginner or experienced gardener. Can’t say enough good things, if you are on the fence...DO IT!
customer_reviews.author: berkley

customer_reviews.title: Messed up. Some packets don’t contain the seeds they’re supposed to contain.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the seeds have been fine. I’ve planted thyme, sage, parsley and basil. They’re doing great. The one labeled “chives” did NOT grow chives. I don’t know WHAT it is or if it’s even an herb at all. It has large, somewhat softly serrated leaves but no scent or flavor at all. The one labeled “oregano” has seeds that are NOT oregano seeds. They are tiny specks, like this—>. I planted them just to see what comes up. I tried to upload photos here but I must have some setting that won’t let me do it. Take my word. Some of the packets don’t contain the seeds they are supposed to contain.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Only a few starter pellets
customer_reviews.text: I used the seeds to create a herb garden corner. Some of them are sturdier than others. The problem is that one usually does not need such a variety of herbs and the ones that I found to be sturdy are the ones that I need the least. I would prefer a more limited, targeted selection (for Italian, or for Mexican food for example- since I don't use cilantro and it is the only one thriving I gave it away).
customer_reviews.author: foodie

customer_reviews.title: Homegrown Quality
customer_reviews.text: The best things come in small packages. Since I was having a hard time finding herbs online, I'm so glad I found these. Most of the food grown over seas isn't as regulated, well inspected, or held accountable as USA food products. So when they say no-gmo, this company means it. They're fairly new and I'm guessing that's why they're not certified USDA organic yet. It takes many years and lots of money to do so. The company makes a great product that has a minimum shelf life of 20yrs. It's a must buy for people who stock up or even the every day gardener. Seriously, I was not paid. I just love their product that much!
customer_reviews.author: Pie

customer_reviews.title: Growth in less than 2 days!
customer_reviews.text: I started these the day they arrived. I ordered the herbs and survival kits. I literally had sprouts the next day (beans and broccoli). 48 hours later the pumpkins, cantaloupe, lettuce, okra and a few others were sending up sprouts!!! I still have a ways to go, but the initial germination results are encouraging!!
customer_reviews.author: Fix-it With Fran

customer_reviews.title: Under 5% Germination
customer_reviews.text: Under 5% germination using several methods. They DO NOT stand by their product and have made ridiculous statements in their emails to us. I will update this review based upon further developments. They refuse to refund the purchase price claiming they want us to dig up the seeds and return them for their examination.
customer_reviews.author: We Review Products

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have For Any Home
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the family green thumb. In fact, we joke I have the black thumb of the family. But I still persist and got these seeds for them being NON_GMO and claiming to be easy to grow. planted them following the directions provided and i had sprouts in 3 days! So excited. Then after about 5 days, I had almost each one with sprouts! I would highly recommend this to anyone (green thumb or not) for herbs.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying this product again. It arrived pretty fast and Every seed I planted so far has sprouted up and looks great. Not only the quality is good but I absolutely loved the packaging, they included so much information about each plant! I was very happy and satisfied. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High germination
customer_reviews.text: I had success growing all of these indoors in the midst of winter! Definitely like a 99% germination rate. This was the herbs after only a couple weeks. The only thing that’s not from here is the garlic (far right). Definitely reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Buy this set!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve spent thousands on buying nearly every seed set on Amazon. This is one of the best. You actually get the seed list with this set, opposed to just receiving little plastic baggies with a sticker of the name on it and no full seed list. This also has a great guide/booklet with it! I’ll update the review once I have results.. but after opening many other companies packages and being disappointed in what was actually received I wanted to give a great review here as this company deserves it. Also to note these are non-gmo and guaranteed USA seeds! The current description mentions 2019, but each package stats the ones received are for 2021 so they’re fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bass

customer_reviews.title: Quality looks great and already have sprouts on about 80% of seeds
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. properly sealed package that arrived on time. Quality looks great and already have sprouts on about 80% of seeds.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Love this for a holiday gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of seed vaults and this makes a perfect gift for all my gardening friends. All the uses of each herb are listed right on the package which makes it easy to the recipients to decide what they want to plant and how they want to use it. These will be much-appreciated by my fellow Master Gardeners!
customer_reviews.author: L. W. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant after seeing reviews that some envelopes were empty, however everything is as described in my package. I didn’t realize that it came with a growing guide- pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I will not buy this product again. Germination was only about 3%. I bought these because they were non GMO. Obviously I need to find a different source.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Seed Selection
customer_reviews.text: After failing miserably at hydroponics, I am reverting back to a more standard method, to see if my luck changes.. Included are the expandable, and somewhat erotic soil cartridges, and more seeds than you can possible shake a stick at. I also purchased the kits that include the mini greenhouses. If all else fails, I could easily go back to writing poetry.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Salniker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit with everything. Such a great kit for beginners who want to try a little of everything.
customer_reviews.text: I grew about 8 seeds from the kit and stored the rest to have. They all have sprouted and are going strong; I bought to kits from them and they are awesome I highly recommend everyone have these in a emergency kit or just to grow your own organic veggies
customer_reviews.author: Dabloesco

customer_reviews.title: Great seads , great value
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these seeds are amazing , out of the hundreds of seeds we planted from this kit , only a few didn’t make it , as in 3 seeds . Seeds seeds seeds ... Seeds
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: So pleased!
customer_reviews.text: First time starting seeds and it was such a success! nicely packaged and the germination rate was true to what they advertised. Plenty of seeds of all kinds. I may have gotten a little too carried away and now have way more plants than i intended!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: These are very good seeds!
customer_reviews.text: I've had good great luck with the seeds that I've tried so far. Anise, Chives, Cilantro, Cumin, Dill, Marjoram, Savory and Thyme. These seeds have germinated and started to thrive in my hydroponic garden. I recommend them if you are looking for a well rounded group of essential herbs.
customer_reviews.author: B. OwenTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: A good assortment
customer_reviews.text: This is a prep item so is unused for now. If unneeded in a few years I will get a replacement and grow these out. I would suggest putting aside a bag of seed starter mix. I just used some and even difficult to germinate peppers all grew.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Only way to garden
customer_reviews.text: I use my Aero Garden to start all my seeds for the outdoor garden and in between I plant these herb seeds. These seeds do sooo much better then the ones from a gardening center or hardware center.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Holland

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Walmart seeds and I also purchased these seeds. I germinate all my seeds in a paper towel first because I like to watch each step as they grow. All of the seeds from this variety pack germinated, and are growing faster than I predicted. Unfortunately my Walmart seeds are struggling. the majority of the seeds I could not get to germinate at all, and the ones that were germinated are remarkably weaker plants.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Refining My (Lack Of) Green Thumb
customer_reviews.text: So far, all the herbs I've planted have rooted. Not all of them survive, however, but that's more or less my lack of a "green thumb." The included booklet is informative, though you may have to look up your hardiness zone for frost dates online or in an almanac to make use of the planting times. Not much else to say other than I'm very pleased with this purchase and my basil and chives are coming along nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price and quality. So far all of the variety that I've sowed have sprouted into hearty little plants that will be put in the garden next month. Too early to know the production but it's all on me from here on out. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: but the ones that grew are wonderful. I had the most success with the cilantro
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for my first year of teaching myself to garden. I only planted a few of the varieties, but the ones that grew are wonderful. I had the most success with the cilantro, basil, and tomatoes, which are fragrant and delicious. The price is awesome and this is a great purchase for a home garden or a survival kit.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Poor germination
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging and good price. Great assortment but poor germination percentage. Several plant groups didn’t germinate at all and those that did were sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando A.

customer_reviews.title: Headline misleading in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I consider the description misleading the way it’s worded you would think it included culinary and also medicinal herbs instead of culinary herbs that can also be used medicinally I was disappointed there weren’t specifically medicinal herbs included.
customer_reviews.author: Delma R. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great Seeds
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time growing this product and I got to say I love this seed packets everytime I get them. They germinate and sprout pretty quickly, right now I'm just waiting on two more to come up but I can tell that they're growing.
customer_reviews.author: mamawolf0608

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to grow and sprouts quickly! I can't wait to see how they taste!
customer_reviews.author: D Cat N D Hat

customer_reviews.title: so far 100% germ rate
customer_reviews.text: best seeds i have got off amazon so far 100% germination rate

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Put them in dirt or plugs with water and they make plants according to the corresponding labels. Accurate germination rates.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good seeds
customer_reviews.text: I tried these out this year just to see if they would grow anything. They seem to work fine. I got lots of starter plants from these seeds. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth S.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I’d say I’m getting a 90% germination rate. Plants look great!
customer_reviews.author: EveG

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand of seeds
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to brand for my seeds I will continue to buy from them. I have been extremely happy with the produce I am getting from these seeds. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Le Blanc

customer_reviews.title: A great value at a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.text: Much less than purchasing these through specialty stores selling Heirloom seeds. Like the great variety packages that are available. Repeat buyer!
customer_reviews.author: Mike on the 45th Parallel in northern Michigan

customer_reviews.title: This herb garden seeds is awesome, this is my second time ordering
customer_reviews.text: This herb garden seeds is awesome, this is my second time ordering. All seeds organic, and all of them growing good. Will definitely buy again next spring.

customer_reviews.title: Did not grow well
customer_reviews.text: The Sage, Cilantro and Thyme did not germinate well. Only about 1/10th grew in each pot. Very disappointed 😞

customer_reviews.title: was recommended by a friend who said they had great success ...

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: All the seed s have provided me with plenty of useable seasoning s

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grow
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried growing plants from seeds before. I followed the directions, put them under a grow light and some of them started to sprout within 2 days. Within 4 days everyone of them started to sprout. I have potted them all and they're all doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Riker

customer_reviews.title: Fast growth and easy instructions to follow.
customer_reviews.text: These seeds are so amazing. I planted them and within 3 to 4 days they were popping up. I planted 2-3 seeds in each hole and they all germinated.

customer_reviews.title: Will I keep fo myself or give as a gift?
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used the product yet, but it my expectations vs what was described and pictured were met.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: Seems well packaged. I hope they'll grow whenever the emergency arises that I start gardening.

customer_reviews.title: I love gardens, and looking at some of the seeds ...
customer_reviews.text: I love gardens, and looking at some of the seeds gave me confidence that everything will grow as planned. Some of these are still germinating, and 'just' beginning to sprout. I couldn't plant early because of the low temps here.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a bad idea. Did not work for me. I didn't use all the seeds so will plant the rest in a regular pot.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. A really awesome package to get started.
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. The basil, arugula and chives came up the others haven't as yet. I guess I will have to plant more. I love that each package had a label so I know which seeds are which.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R.

customer_reviews.title: Got pod?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how much the pods helped, but, if you want pods, this is the best deal for a herb kit. If you're new to gardening, I do recommend you go on the internet to see which herbs are the easiest to grow.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Need to stock up
customer_reviews.text: These seeds will someday be worth more than Gold... Everyone should stock up! Comes in packages that will protect and preserve them.

customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Haven't planted yet but couldn't pass up the deal.

customer_reviews.title: Are You Preparing?
customer_reviews.text: I'm storing these seeds in case of a SHTF situation. For those concerned with the mix of egies, I suggest purchasing these and similoar products from other sources. This should diversify your grain, root, and vegie varieties. Every family should have some of this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mahatma Head

customer_reviews.title: The idea is great. But the seed quality isn't great or even ...
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great. But the seed quality isn't great or even good quality. Out of 12 seeds that I've planted only 3 or 4 sprouted out. I planted the seeds of the 12 twice to make sure that it wasn't the product but maybe the growing method in which I was using but than again the same thing only a few grew to only a certain stage and stopped growing. I have two gardens and I'm a experienced gardener.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Abe

product_meta.title: 100% Non-GMO Heirloom Culinary and Medicial Herb Kit - 12 Popular Easy-to-Grow Herb Seeds by Open Seed Vault - Includes 12 Seed Starting peat pellets!
product_meta.description:
WHY OPEN SEED VAULT'S SEEDS ARE SUPERIOR

-We provide full planting and seed harvesting instructions for each herb so you can continue to grow year after year. 
-Beware of cheap imitations. Our Herb Vault contains twice the amount of herb seeds versus competitors. 
-Easy start with 12 Free seed starting Peat Pellets Included
-Makes a Perfect Gift for your Gardener, Chef or Survivalist! 

EACH PACK CONTAINS THE FOLLOWING 12 SEED PACKETS:

1. Basil Italian ≈ 200 mg 
2. Anise ≈ 250 mg 
3. Sage Broad leaved ≈ 200mg
4. Chives Common ≈ 200 mg
5. Cilantro Slow Bolt ≈ 500 mg
6. Cumin ≈ 500 mg
7. Dill Bouquet ≈ 250 mg 
8. Oregano Italian ≈ 200 mg
9. Thyme Winter ≈ 200 mg 
10. Parsley Flat Leaf ≈ 350 mg 
11. Summer Savory ≈ 250 mg 
12. Arugula Slow Bolt ≈ 400mg 
14-Page Growing and Seed Saving Guide

(Plus 12 Seed Starting Peat Pellets) 

Includes over 3,500 Seeds!
feature_bullets: 12 Varieties of the most popular essential herbs, including Anise, Arugula, Basil, Chives, Cilantro, Cumin, Dill Oregano, Parsley, Sage, Savory, and Thyme.
100% Naturally Grown and Open Pollinated seeds from 2019 with high Germination Rates exceeding all government standards.
Easy-to-follow Printed 14 page Gardening Guide provided including detailed planting instructions, Uses, and Benefits of each Herb
Each Herb Vault includes 12 Seed Starting Peat Pellets to plant your own kitchen herb garden. It's quick and all in one package!
GREAT GIFT! - Perfect for your Gardener, Survivalist or Chef!
